title: 【國際交流活動】韓國明知大學 Myongji University Winter Short-term Program
department: 國際事務處國際學生組

author.department: 國際事務處國際學生組
author.name: 呂姿穎

content:
分類： 活動公告
來源： 國際事務處國際學生組 - 呂姿穎 - issa@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5173
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【國際交流活動】韓國明知大學 Myongji University Winter Short-term Program
日期： Thu, 7 Nov 2024 13:58:21 +0800
附檔： (ENG)24_윈터_단기_포스터__.pdf (768 KB)   GUARDIAN (PARENTAL) CONSENT FORM.pdf (135 KB)   Privacy Policy Agreement.pdf (549 KB)   
English version in below

◎時間：2025.01.05 ~ 2025.01.18

◎地點：韓國  明知大學

◎費用：

一週 : 1150 USD
兩週 : 1800 USD
(皆不包含機票、保險及其他個人花費）

◎報名截止時間：2024.12.10

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*在學證明
*家長同意書

2.自行到姊妹校提供之連結報名: https://reurl.cc/kyRRgr

3.等待姐妹校通知。

注意事項：

1. 具體申請細節及其他資訊請詳閱簡章。
2. 國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

English version

◎Period：January 5~ January 18, 2025

◎Location：Myongji University, Korea

◎Fee：

1week：1150 USD

2week：1800 USD

(Excluding airfare, insurance, and other personal expenses)

◎Registration Deadline：December 10, 2024

1. Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.
Google form：https://reurl.cc/2jAzQ9

*Student Status Certificate
*Parental Consent Letter

2. Complete application at : https://reurl.cc/kyRRgr
3. Await the announcement from Myongji University.

For further information, please visit their website and check out their brochure.

Please note:

1. For detailed application instructions and other information, please refer to the brochure.
2. The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
